docs.snippet: The Lockport Advertiser says that on Feb. 7, when the mercury was ten degrees below zero, a lady and gentleman came some nine miles to Lockport, in a cutter, for the purpose of being married.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Lockport Advertiser says that on Feb. 7, when the mercury was ten degrees below zero, a lady and gentleman came some nine miles to Lockport, in a cutter, for the purpose of being married.

docs.snippet: The reception at the Tuileries two evenings ago was unusually brilliant. It was the first of the season, and had the advantage of bringing together for the first time all the new diplomatists and distinguished foreigners which the year has...

headline.main: AMERICANS IN PARIS.; Reception at the Tuileries What Americans were Presented Incidents, &c. Amusements.

docs.lead_paragraph: The reception at the Tuileries two evenings ago was unusually brilliant. It was the first of the season, and had the advantage of bringing together for the first time all the new diplomatists and distinguished foreigners which the year has contributed to the population of Paris.

headline.main: THE BOYCE FAMILY A HARD CASE.

docs.snippet: The bark Starlight, of Boston, which sails on the 24th for home, is the first opportunity for mail this month. By her I send these few lines.

headline.main: FROM OUR AFRICAN SQUADRON.; Our Cruising Vessels--Capture of Slavers-- Visit to St. Helena.

docs.lead_paragraph: The bark Starlight, of Boston, which sails on the 24th for home, is the first opportunity for mail this month. By her I send these few lines.
